instructions: From any home screen, tap Messages . Tap Menu icon > Settings . Select the Spam filter check box. Tap Add to spam numbers . Tap the plus sign. Manually enter the number or choose from contacts. When finished, tap Save .
From any home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the conversation thread. Tap Menu icon > Add to spam numbers . Tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Messages . Tap the Menu icon > Settings . Select the Spam filter check box. Tap Add to spam numbers . Touch and hold the number. Tap Delete . Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the conversation thread. Tap Menu icon > Remove from spam numbers . Tap OK .
From any home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the message, then tap Delete .
From any home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the message and then tap Delete .
From any home screen, tap Messages . Tap to expand the conversation thread. Touch and hold the message and then tap Delete . Tap OK .

From any home screen, tap Messages . Touch and hold the conversation. Verify the conversation you wish to delete has a green check in the check box Verify any conversations you do not wish to delete are not checked. Tap Select all to delete all conversations. Tap the trash can and then tap OK .

From any home screen, tap Messages . Tap the conversation thread. Touch and hold the picture, then tap Save attachment . Tap the file name to select the the check box. Tap Save . The picture is saved in the Gallery inside the download folder
From any home screen, tap Messages . Tap the Menu > Settings . Tap Text messages . View the number under Message center . This field cannot be changed.
